author: marekr

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @marekr can you try latest PSReadLine 2.0.0-beta2?  Just tried ssh on macBook and it renders fine.  Include more specific repro steps if this is still an issue.  Thanks.

comments.author: MaximoTrinidad
comments.body:
Repo steps should always be included:

1. Open MacOs terminal session
2. Create a remote connection using Enter-PSSession
3. Then, set terminal session to full-screen.
4. Use "dir"command to populate the screen with list of files.

At this point the issue shows when the cursor jumps to the middle of the screen.
This is with PSReadline version 1.2

![pwsh_cursorjump_2018-06-05_7-47-58](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19892435/40975214-3183ca86-6898-11e8-82b1-e38c156d1eb2.jpg)

Installed PSReadline-Beta2 and the symptoms seems to be corrected:

![pwsh_psreadbeta2_2018-06-05_7-47-58](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19892435/40975268-5dde01b4-6898-11e8-9d8d-4a8b74d8995c.jpg)
